title: Honor Level 2 Stuck?
body:
Good afternoon, everyone.

So, basically I am playing for 3-4 months, I am already Level 22 (I should be on 30 already, but due to some issues, I stopped playing) and I am getting honor from most of the games and I am still stuck on Level 2 Honor. I also honor the teammate that deserve.

Am I getting any kind of bug or can someone explain me this situation?

Best Regards <3

replies.body: It looks like you're still earning honor progress, but that xp might be a bit slowed down due to some chat logs that were borderline punishable. Some things might not immediately get you some form of punishment like a chat suspension, but it might slow your honor progress a bit instead.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=j3ELG292,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-19T23:34:10.164+0000)
>
> It looks like you're still earning honor progress, but that xp might be a bit slowed down due to some chat logs that were borderline punishable. Some things might not immediately get you some form of punishment like a chat suspension, but it might slow your honor progress a bit instead.

that's a lie literally witnessed a person said "go die" and get honor 5 after that game even though i reported and I'm still here at honor 3 and i don't even get toxic in chat i just complain out loud irl but never to my teammates and i used to try and be friendly to everyone but now i don't like even typing in chat cause even though i get honored and am friendly i see toxic people getting honor 4 and 5 and I'm still stuck here at honor 3 it makes me feel like I'm the toxic asshole.

Hey there!

Remember:

- the whole team gets a slight bonus to their honor level if every teammate votes. We win and lose as a team, together.
- Being honored only slightly boosts your progression
- Be consistently honored by being an awesome teammate
- Multiple honors help boost your honor even more

You're 22! You're so young! You'll have all the time in the worl-...wait..nvm..(it's....it's a joke). {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Anyways, I'm not too sure on honor progression for levels pre-30; but it looks like you've been an awesome teammate - I'm sure you'll get Honor Level 3 and get to 5 quickly! If you have any more questions, just respond below!

Hope I helped! 
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
